summary: Census data is used for things like congressional redistricting and to allocate billions each year in federal funds. Consequently, it is necessary that the Census Bureau ensures that the data it collects is accurate and of high quality. We described the Census Bureau’s plans to resolve data quality issues facing the 2020 Census, like missing or incomplete responses. For instance, to resolve missing household responses...
title: 2020 Census: Changes Planned to Improve Data Quality
